comments:
I've tried two Java 5 JREs. The IBM JRE works, but the Sun JRE fails everytime.

I've written a very simple JUnit test that creates a file based on a DOM object. In the teardown method I attempt to delete the project containing the file and I encounter an error. I'm attempting to delete the project, but I've determined the error is happening when attempting to delete the file.

I will attach my plug-in. Here's the stack trace:

This bug can be closed. This link explains what is going on (it's a SUN issue): http://bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=6216226
